reason: Bitcoin is holding steady, indicating consolidation, but significant liquidation pressure on meme coins (Dogecoin) and weakness in other altcoins (XRP) suggest a broader market distribution phase where capital is moving out of riskier assets. The Coinbase news introduces more leverage potential, adding to systemic risk, while the South Korea incident highlights security concerns. Overall, caution is advised as the market exhibits mixed signals with underlying weakness.
headlines: Bitcoin and yen hold steady as Japan's inflation eases and BOJ keeps interest rates unchanged
Coinbase lets users borrow up to $1 million against staked ether without selling
South Korea probes loss of seized bitcoin in phishing attack
XRP slips to $1.93 despite early signs of a technical rebound
Dogecoin falls 2% as liquidation pressure hits meme coins
